amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce portions of the VA Adjudication Procedural Manual M21-1 which relate to a narrowing of interpretation of the Agent Orange Act of 1991.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce VA Adjudication Procedure Manual M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section H, Topic 28.h related to Developing Claims Based on Service Aboard Ships Offshore the RVN.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Gibson.
